data.title: JJ Redick Is Expected To Be Named Lakers Head Coach According To NBA Insider
data.meta_description: According Chris Haynes, it's only a matter of time before JJ Redick is named the new coach of the Los Angeles Lakers.
data.text:
JJ Redick has been reported as one of the frontrunners to lead the Los Angeles Lakers as their new head coach. The name that has reportedly piqued the Lakers' attention the most is Redick. JJ Redick is presently employed by ESPN as an NBA commentator and podcaster. He and NBA player LeBron James have a podcast where they discuss all things basketball and the league. JJ's basketball IQ has amazed a lot of people, and it truly comes through when he speaks with LeBron. Now, according to an insider, it's only a matter of time before Redick is named the new coach of the Lakers.

JJ Redick Presumed To Be Named Lakers Head Coach
